article_title: Excommunicated bishop still sees himself as Roman Catholic
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

NAIROBI, Kenya (RNS) Excommunicated Zambian Archbishop Emmanuel Milingo, who advocates for married priests within the Roman Catholic Church, said he has not split from Rome though many of the priests he ordained no longer see themselves as part of the church. “We are not a breakaway church,” said Milingo, who married Maria Sung, a Korean […]

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Culture, Institutions, Africa, Catholic, Emmanuel Milingo, married priests, Roman Catholic Church, Zambia

og.description: (RNS) Milingo’s quest to reunite with Rome may be quixotic. The Catholic Church has cut all ties to him.

NAIROBI, Kenya (RNS) Excommunicated Zambian Archbishop Emmanuel Milingo, who advocates for married priests within the Roman Catholic Church, said he has not split from Rome though many of the priests he ordained no longer see themselves as part of the church.
